00002 #define _XSVFPORT_H_INCLUDED

00004 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00005 // External functions used by XSVF player:
00006 // 
00007 //     ReadXSVF : Read byte from XSVF data stream
00008 //     SetTMS   : Set TMS pin on JTAG port
00009 //     SetTCK   : Set TCK pin on JTAG port
00010 //     SetTDI   : Set TDI pin on JTAG port
00011 //     GetTDO   : Read TDO pin on JTAG port
00012 //     uSleep   : Delay execution (in microseconds)
00013 //
00014 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00015 
00016 #include "sam7xpud.hpp" 
00017 
00018 #define xsvfPrintf(...)  tracef( 1, __VA_ARGS__ )
00019 
00020 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 
00022 static inline int ReadXSVF( void )
00023 {
00024     return xsvf.getc ();
00025     }
00026 
00027 static inline void SetTMS( int val )
00028 {
00029     if ( val )
00030         AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_JTAG_TMS );
00031     else
00032         AT91F_PIO_ClearOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_JTAG_TMS );
00033     }
00034 
00035 static inline void SetTCK( int val )
00036 {
00037     if ( val )
00038         AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_JTAG_TCK );
00039     else
00040         AT91F_PIO_ClearOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_JTAG_TCK );
00041 
00042     asm volatile( "NOP" ); // We need this so TDO can settle before GetTDO()
00043     asm volatile( "NOP" );
00044     }
00045 
00046 static inline void SetTDI( int val )
00047 {
00048     if ( val )
00049         AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_JTAG_TDI );
00050     else
00051         AT91F_PIO_ClearOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_JTAG_TDI );
00052     }
00053 
00054 static inline int GetTDO( void )
00055 {
00056     return ISSET( AT91F_PIO_GetInput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA ), FPGA_JTAG_TDO );
00057     }
00058 
00059 extern void uSleep( long microsec );
00060 
00061 #endif // _XSVFPORT_H_INCLUDED
